event.title: 1 January 2015 the former municipalities of Arvigo, Braggio, Cauco and Selma merged

data.event: On 1 January 2015 the former municipalities of Arvigo, Braggio, Cauco and Selma merged to form the new municipality of Calanca.
As of 2008, 8.3% of the population was made up of foreign nationals.
Most of the population (as of 2000) speaks Italian (65.9%), with the rest (34.1%) speaking German.
